October 6, 2021 Interviews, Projects About Christian Bettstetter is professor at the Institute of Networked and Embedded Systems at U Klagenfurt and scientific director of Lakeside Labs. (Zur Person) Bettstetter and his team work on wireless communications and self-organization in networks. Ongoing research comprises interference, relaying, and synchronization in wireless systems, robot exploration, and UAV communications. He teaches courses on 'electricity and magnetism' and 'mobile communications and networks.' Overview slides Tool advice Trello is a software tool to manage projects and workflows using Kanban boards.
